Introducing the All-New Haval H6 Hybrid Electric Vehicle (HEV), the first-ever self-charging Haval Hybrid
in South Africa.
The All-New H6 Hybrid emits a combined 121g/km CO2 and has a decreased fuel consumption of only 5.2L/100km*
due to the hybrid technology of the petrol engine and electric motor.
Under the H6 HEVâ€™s stylish hood is the responsive Petrol Engine that
produces 113kW/233Nm and Battery Power of 139kW/300Nm, this
produces a combined output of 179kW and 530Nm of torque. Proven to
be one of our most awe-inspiring hybrid sports performers yet, the New
H6 HEV is ready to take you from 0-100 Km/h in a rewarding 8,5 Seconds.
